languages.text: {n}Янрис Данрок, щеголяющий ранее вами не виданной кобурой с авторужьем, откашливается, прежде чем начать.{/n} "Имею честь доложить, Лорд-капитан: нападение на судно отбито, палубы очищены от посторонних, прорехи в корпусе устранены или находятся в процессе устранения. Высокие гости желают поздравить вас с победой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Янрис Данрок, щеголяющий ранее вами не виданной кобурой с автоганом, откашливается, прежде чем начать.{/n} "Имею честь доложить, Лорд-капитан: нападение на судно отбито, палубы очищены от посторонних, прорехи в корпусе устранены или находятся в процессе устранения. В целом, ваше пустотное судно пребывает в состоянии, достаточном для совершения варп-трансляции".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."
languages.original_text: {n}Янрис Данрок, щеголяющий ранее вами не виданной кобурой с авторужьем, откашливается, прежде чем начать.{/n} "Имею честь доложить, Лорд-капитан: нападение на судно отбито, палубы очищены от посторонних, прорехи в корпусе устранены или находятся в процессе устранения. Высокие гости желают поздравить вас с победой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you haven't seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. Your voidship's overall condition is sufficient for performing a spatial translation."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}詹里斯·丹罗克拿着枪套，枪套里装着一把你从来没见过的自动枪。他清了清喉咙，开了口。{/n}“报告，舰长大人，敌人的袭击已经被击退，甲板上所有的入侵者都被消灭了。目前我们正在修补舰体的受损区域，您的船上来了几位贵客，想要恭喜您的胜利。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}詹里斯·丹罗克拿着枪套，枪套里装着一把你从来没见过的自动枪。他清了清喉咙，开了口。{/n}“报告，舰长大人，敌人的袭击已经被击退，甲板上所有的入侵者都被消灭了。目前我们正在修补舰体的受损区域，您的船上来了几位贵客，想要恭喜您的胜利。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Janris Danrok räuspert sich. Er trägt ein gehalftertes Sturmgewehr, das dir bisher nie aufgefallen ist.{/n} "Erstatte Bericht, Lord Captain: Der Angriff auf das Schiff wurde zurückgeschlagen. Alle Decks wurden von Eindringlingen gesäubert. Schäden an der Hülle wurden oder werden repariert. Ihr habt bedeutende Besucher, die Euch zu Eurem Sieg beglückwünschen möchten."
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris Danrok räuspert sich. Er trägt ein gehalftertes Sturmgewehr, das dir bisher nie aufgefallen ist.{/n} "Erstatte Bericht, Lord Captain: Der Angriff auf das Schiff wurde zurückgeschlagen. Alle Decks wurden von Eindringlingen gesäubert. Schäden an der Hülle wurden oder werden repariert. Ihr habt bedeutende Besucher, die Euch zu Eurem Sieg beglückwünschen möchten."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Janris Danrok carraspea antes de empezar a hablar. Porta en bandolera un rifle automático que no le habías visto antes.{/n} «A sus órdenes, Lord Capitán: el ataque a la nave ha sido repelido. Todas las cubiertas han quedado libres de intrusos. Las brechas en el casco han sido reparadas o están en proceso. Tiene usted visitantes eminentes que desean felicitarle por su victoria».
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Janris Danrok carraspea antes de empezar a hablar. Porta en bandolera un rifle automático que no le habías visto antes.{/n} «A sus órdenes, Lord Capitán: el ataque a la nave ha sido repelido. Todas las cubiertas han quedado libres de intrusos. Las brechas en el casco han sido reparadas o están en proceso. Tiene usted visitantes eminentes que desean felicitarle por su victoria».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Armé d'un fusil d'assaut que vous n'aviez encore jamais vu, logé dans son holster, Janris Danrok s'éclaircit la gorge avant de parler.{/n} « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : l'attaque contre le vaisseau a été repoussée. Plus aucun intrus n'occupe les ponts, et les brèches dans la coque ont été colmatées ou le seront bientôt. En outre, d'éminents visiteurs sont venus vous féliciter pour votre victoire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Armé d'un fusil d'assaut que vous n'aviez encore jamais vu, logé dans son holster, Janris Danrok s'éclaircit la gorge avant de parler.{/n} « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : l'attaque contre le vaisseau a été repoussée. Plus aucun intrus n'occupe les ponts, et les brèches dans la coque ont été colmatées ou le seront bientôt. En outre, d'éminents visiteurs sont venus vous féliciter pour votre victoire. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}見たこともないオートガンをホルスターに収めたジャンリス・ダンロックは、口を開く前に咳払いをする。{/n}「報告いたします、ロード・キャプテン。船への攻撃は撃退いたしました。全デッキから侵入者を排除し船体の損傷は修復中でございます。貴殿の勝利に祝意を表する高名な来訪者がおりますが」
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}見たこともないオートガンをホルスターに収めたジャンリス・ダンロックは、口を開く前に咳払いをする。{/n}「報告いたします、ロード・キャプテン。船への攻撃は撃退いたしました。全デッキから侵入者を排除し船体の損傷は修復中でございます。貴殿の勝利に祝意を表する高名な来訪者がおりますが」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Daha önce hiç görmediğin, kılıfında duran bir ototüfekle böbürlenen Janris Danrok, başlamadan önce boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Raporumu arz ederim Lord Kaptan: Gemiye düzenlenen saldırı önlendi. İzinsiz girenler, güvertelerden temizlendi. Gövdedeki oyuklar onarıldı veya onarılmakta. Zaferinizi kutlamak isteyen saygın misafirlerse sizi bekliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Sporting a holstered autogun you have not seen before, Janris Danrok clears his throat before he begins.{/n} "Reporting, Lord Captain: the attack on the ship has been repelled. All decks have been cleared of trespassers. Hull breaches have been or are being mended. You have eminent visitors who wish to congratulate you on your victory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daha önce hiç görmediğin, kılıfında duran bir ototüfekle böbürlenen Janris Danrok, başlamadan önce boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'a bildiriliyor: Gemiye düzenlenen saldırı önlendi. İzinsiz giriş yapan herkes güvertelerden temizlendi. Gövdedeki oyuklar onarıldı veya onarılmakta. Zaferinizi kutlamak isteyen saygın misafirler sizi bekliyorlar."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
